title: David M.Torres-Mendoza
text:
I’m a Ph.D. student in Computer Science & Engineering at UC Santa Cruz, where I focus on broadening participation in computing—exploring how students from underrepresented backgrounds discover and engage with the field, what supports or blocks their progress, and how to design more inclusive programs and environments.
